item.title: New US security strategy aligns with Russia's vision, Moscow says
item.description: The Kremlin welcomes the starkly worded document, which does not cast Russia as a threat to the US.

item.title: Nightclub fire in India's Goa kills 25 staff and tourists
item.description: Eyewitnesses described scenes of panic in one of Goa's bustling nightlife areas.

item.title: Benin coup attempt foiled by loyalist troops, interior minister says
item.description: A presidential adviser tells the BBC that President Patrice Talon is in a safe location.

item.title: Chernobyl radiation shield 'lost safety function' after drone strike, UN watchdog says
item.description: The protective shield at the site of the 1986 disaster has lost its main safety function, the IAEA says.

item.title: Katy Perry goes Instagram official with Justin Trudeau
item.description: The pop star posted a string of photographs of herself and the former Canadian Prime Minster.
